ygData.subject: Re: OOPS  Accidental Kill Steal.
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm... Bob, how come your text turns out so screwed up every time?  The text looks to be pretty intelligent but it is largely unreadable because of the
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm... Bob, how come your text turns out so screwed up every time? The
text looks to be pretty intelligent but it is largely unreadable because of
the doubled letters. I don't know if its your program for email or what is
going on, but all of your posts turn out this way, at least the ones I have
seen.
I hope you can get it to come out right, because it appears you have
valuable contributions to make to the list.
